title: Wire
description: A wire connects a terminal to a port and is the implementation of an underlying space which is passed between these two.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: A unique identifier for the wire.

Parent.title: Parent
Parent.description: The ID of the space that the wire is passing.

Processor.title: Processor
Processor.description: The ID of the processor that the wire is coming from.

Index.title: Index
Index.description: The index of the terminal that the wire is coming from.

Processor.title: Processor
Processor.description: The ID of the processor that the wire is going to.

Index.title: Index
Index.description: The index of the port that the wire is going to.
